commit message:
Only update ringer mode if vibrate opt was changed

Closes #1

Build against SDK version 4 and target version 10

When targeting SDK version 3, 'Storage: modify/delete SD card contents'
and 'Phone calls: read phone state and identity' permissions are
automatically added.
To fix it, I'm targeting SDK version 10 while leaving minimum version 3.
This requires that I build the app against SDK version 4.
Add allow backup to the application manifest

Remove proguard default config options

These configuration options are now inherited from sdk tools.
